input.sentences: the band performs with great dedication for the eager audience .
the drummer is really into the groove now .
[male] sings that one hit we all know and love .
[male] pours his heart into the guitar solo .
he gives an emotional speech to the audience | in thanks for the opportunity .
output.sentences: Today was our first live concert.
I played drums, I was so nervous.
The lead singer did really well, but he was nervous too.
We all jammed out for what felt like hours.
We had one closing song, and the crowd really liked it.
